summary.span: 包含支持 Windows 窗体和 WPF 控件的互操作的类。

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间包含的类可实现 Windows 窗体和 WPF 技术之间的互操作。The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the Windows Forms and WPF technologies. 使用类时 ，可以在 wpf 页上承载 Windows 窗体控件，并在基于 Windows 窗体的应用程序中承载 wpf 元素。When you use classes, you can host Windows Forms controls on WPF pages, and WPF elements in Windows Forms-based applications. 实现互操作功能的两个关键类是 和 。The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . 使用哪个类取决于您的控件实现：Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - 当必须在 WPF 页上使用 Windows 窗体控件时，请使用类。Use the class when you must use a Windows Forms control on a WPF page. - 当必须在基于 Windows 窗体的应用程序中使用 WPF 元素时，请使用类。Use the class when you must use a WPF element in a Windows Forms-based application.
